subject: TReDS - Extension request - Quote retured/ withdrawn.
body:
{{{header}}} Dear Sir/Madam,

The extension request was placed on {{createDate}}.
Factoring Unit ID{{id}}
Instrument ID{{inId}}
Invoice No.{{instNumber}}
Factoring Unit Amount{{amount}}
Buyer{{purName}}
Fu Due Date{{oldDate}}
New Due Date{{newDate}}
The financier had accepted the request with the quote {{extendedRate}} The quote has been declined by buyer. {{{footer}}}
